original_text: Moab has been proud and it has turned against the Lord. So they will no longer be a nation.’ Moab has been proud and it has turned against the Lord. So they will no longer be a nation.’ Moab has been proud and it has turned against the Lord.
korean_text: 모압이 여호와를 거슬러 자만하였으므로 멸망하고 다시 나라를 이루지 못하리로다

sentences.original_text: and it has turned against the Lord
So they will no longer be a nation
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그들은 더 이상 나라가 되지 않을 것입니다
